article: ghanaian president jerry john rawlings tuesday urged the economic community of west african states -lrb- ecowas -rrb- to shake off their over-reliance on colonial masters and work towards promoting the economic integration of the sub-region .
abstract: ghana urges ecowas to promote economic integration
